string.value: What the Yellow King Goblin Wants
The Guardian Spirit says the Goblins of Kamak Mountain are the only ones that know something about the Old Fox. Go see the #bYellow King Goblin#k at #bDokebi House#k near the Haunted House.

The Yellow King Goblin says he will tell everything about the Old Fox only if I get him #b1 plate#k of his favorite #broasted pork#k. Let's go buy roasted pork from the Folk Town. #k \n\n#i2022050##t2022050#/1
The Yellow King Goblin revealed the spell the Old Fox uses.
무서워. 밤은 무서워. 큰 소리 나는 건 더 무서워. 벼락 치는 소리는 세상에서 제일 무서워. 벼락 치는 밤에 잃어버렸던 도깨비 방망이를 아직도 찾지 못했다구! 어...? 왜 인간이 여기 있는 거지?
아니면 뭐하러 여기까지 온 거야? 이상한 인간이네.

I'm scared. I'm scared of the dark. I'm scared of loud noises. I'm scared of the thunder the most. I still haven't found my Goblin Bat I lost during a thundering night! What...? What is a human doing here?

Don't shout! I'm also scared of humans shouting! Especially loud, human females! I just can't stand them! ...what? You want to know about the Old Fox? Of course I know about the Old Fox... but why would a human like you want to know about the #rOld Fox#k?
If you want to know about the Old Fox, get me a plate of #broasted pork#k. I'll tell you everything I know about the Old Fox if you bring me a well-seasoned, roasted pork!
Then why are you here in the first place? Strange humans.
Oh! This smells scrumptious! You've brought the roasted pork! Okay, you goody two shoes! I'll tell you everything I know about the Old Fox!

The Old Fox knows many spells. Spells ranging from black magic like the one that makes you blind, or weakening spells that takes your strength away so that you can't run. The Old Fox also knows how to make someone faint. You must be careful because they also can heal each other.
Where is my #broasted pork#k? No roasted pork, no Old Fox information!
